amathya lakshman kirialla, madhyama palath aandukara pi. bi. disanayaka, pa්radhana amathya sarath eekanayaka yana mahathwarun athulu palathe paksha, wipaksha mahajana niyojithayin rasak saha disthi්rak lekamwarun, pa්radeshiya lekamwarun, departhamenthu pa්radhanin athulu palathe rajya niladharin mema meheyum kamitu raswimata ekwa sitiyaha.
siya rakiya anathure bawa owun kiyaddi pawithrata saha prasannata katha kala mahinda mihin lanka wikinima gana parlimenthuwedi wiwadayak illannayi upades dunneya.

ee samangama eeta adalawa kottawa adhiwegi piwisumedi polis niladhariya laba dun dada kolayata adala mudala gewa riyaduru balapathraya labagath bawada likhitha lekhana osse oppu kaleya.thawada ema awasthawedi ema polis niladhariya thama riyadurata saha thamata birinda daruwan idiriye itha pahath aakarayen katha kala aakarayath thama saha ohu athara wachana huwamaruwak athiwimen pasu thama ema awasthawema jyeshta niyojya polispathiwarayakuta saha adhiwegi margaya bhara adhyakshaka jyeshta polis niladhariyata paminili kala bawath penwa dunneya.thawada niyojya amathiwaraya pawasanne edina ema siddhiyen dina gananawakata pasu adala polis niladhariyata ayath yayi kiyana wahanayak gini ganime siddhiyata thama sakakaru yayi ema polis niladhariya madhya haraha prakashakara athath thama kisiseth eeta sambandha nathi athara thama me wana wita soyagena athi thorathuruwalata anuwa ema polis niladhariyage paudgalika awashyathawayak matha salasumsahagathawa ema gini thabime siddhiya siduwi athi bawaya.kese wethath ema siddhiya sambandhawa sampurna parikshanayak pawathwa waradikaru soya nisi danduwam dena lesata niyojya amathiwaraya polispathiwarayagen illa sitina athara thama waraddak kara siti nam eeta danduwam windimata sudanam bawada madhya haraha pawasa sitiyeya.

ee anuwa tharaga 2kin samamanwitha tharagamalawa depilama tharaga 1 - 1 bagin jaya gena samawa awasan wiya.adu mulu lakunu sankhya wartha wu me tharagaya shri lankawa jaya gaththe oowara hatharakatath wadiyen ithiriwa thibiyadiya.prathamayen panduwata pahara dun nawasilantha pile siyaluma kridakayo oowara 17.3k athulatha lakunu 81 kata dawi giyaha.shri lankawa oowara 15.3kadi kadulu 3k pamanak dawi lakunu 86k ras karamin tharagaya pahasuwenma jaya gaththe ya.nuwan kulasekara nawasilantha mul pithikaru pela binda damamin brendan makalam ha eeran redmand da rob nikol da dawalamin dewani oowarayedi kadulu 3k binda heliya.nawasilanthaya ek awasthawaka lakunu 13kata kadulu 5k ahimiwa dadi asarana thaththwayakata pathwa sitiye ya.ema pila wenuwen yam sarthakathwayak ho pennum kala pithikaruwan wuye daniyal wetori ha nedan makalam pamani.wetorige lakunu 27 nawasilanthayata yam balaporoththuwak athi kala athara nedan makalamge lakunu 36 nawasilanthaya mulu lakunu 81k kara gena giye ya.18 wani oowarayedi owunge inima awasan wiya.
